page.title: 08EDUCATION GOLDSBOROUGH AREA
page.content: Goldsborough Church of England School was built around 1860 with two new classrooms added later.There are 67 on roll.Children are aged between 5 to 11 The main toilet block is outside in the centre of our windy playground. Our uniform is optional.It is grey and gold,girls wear yellow dresses in summer. Some of us walk to school,others come by car or school bus.Our dinners are brought from Knaresbro'. We have lessons in English,maths,P.E. handwriting,music(recorders and some play guitar).We go on outside visits to help us with Topic."Mums"come to help with baking and craft."Dads"help in many ways! We have a super P.T.A.! Harvest Thanksgiving and Christmas are celebrated in church;our Summer Concert is in School.
